Module com.example.rubankgui
Package com.example.rubankgui

Class CollegeChecking

java.lang.Object
com.example.rubankgui.Account
com.example.rubankgui.Checking
com.example.rubankgui.CollegeChecking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
public class CollegeChecking extends Checking
Defines a College Checking account for a user based on their information, balance, and college campus.
Author:
Deshna Doshi, Haejin Song

    • calcFee

      public int calcFee()
